line.name: text
line.label: Will open doors and spring traps if necessary.

line.name: text
line.label: If any character is adjacent to a captive Orchid, they may forgo an action to free the captive, immediately removing them from the map.

line.name: text
line.label: For each captive Freed, Redthorn adds +1 Attack to all his attacks.

line.name: text
line.label: For each altar that isn't destroyed, regardless of whether it has been revealed, the maximum hit point and attack values of all demons is increased by 1 and their movement and range values are increased by 0.5 (rounded up). Melee attacks do not increase in range.

line.name: text
line.label: While the following Chords are unbroken, apply the following:

line.name: text
line.label: 1: All monsters add +1 attack to all their attacks.

line.name: text
line.label: 2: All monster gain Advantage on all their attacks.

line.name: text
line.label: 3: All monsters heal 1 hit point at the start of each of their turns.

line.name: text
line.label: 4: All char. and char. summons suffer 1 damage at the start of each of their turn.

line.name: text
line.label: 5: All char. and char. summons gain Disadvantage on all their attacks.

line.name: text
line.label: 6: All char. and char. summons deduct -1 Attack from all their attacks.

line.name: text
line.label: The Crystal is prioritized by monsters.

line.name: text
line.label: It cannot be healed and is not considered an ally.

line.name: text
line.label: Twice during a scenario, any character may lose one card from their hand to have it suffer no damage instead.

line.name: text
line.label: Fear: All characters and characters summons are forced to Move 4 in initiative order, ending as far away from the Betrayer as possible.

line.name: text
line.label: Mind Control: All char and char summons are forced to move to the closest hex adjacent to the Betrayer. The char with highest initiative (except 99) is then mind controlled this round.

line.name: text
line.label: On their turn, Move 2 and perform the top action of their leading initiative card. Then discard* all cards. All summons the affected character owns are also mind controlled.
